title: The press realizes where it’s failed and starts to change
description: What follows is less a prediction than a hope: that the press will begin in the next year to finally recognize the true nature of its failure and begin to change the nature of the journalism it offers the public. The most common explanation for the crisis in journalism is that the advertising revenue that...
